1370: Rutgerus was born in Die lange straet3 in 1370.
Got married to Atghardis at age 21 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Atghardis, Wauthem, at age 22.
1372: Had a son with Atghardis, Niels, at age 23.
1374: Had a son with Atghardis, Meynolphus, at age 25.
1375: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Marisseis, at age 26.
Lost daughter Marisseis when Marisseis was 1 years old.
1376: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Baua, at age 27.
1381: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Emgelberna, at age 32.
1382: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Aue, at age 33.
1383: Lost daughter Emgelberna when Emgelberna was 3 years old.
1386: Had a son with Atghardis, Dolf, at age 37.
1387: Had a son with Atghardis, Arnst, at age 38.
1390: Had a son with Atghardis, Rutgerus, at age 41.
1394: Lost daughter Aue when Aue was 13 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
